overview: Porn stars have sexual fantasies just like everyone else. Because they spend their working hours living out the fantasies of others – directors, producers, screenwriters – their own certainly tend to be a little more bizarre than those of the girl or guy who lives next door. With that in mind. Fantasy Confidential presents an interview show that outdoes all other candid interviews in its unblinking look at the intimate details of the fantasy life of the top adult stars.
title: Fantasy Confidential
